resources.string: Press button below to launch external e-mail application.

OnTime Tool is a mobile software solution created by Global Business Engineers Ayla Lundorff and Kristoffer Sejer Broedloes. In relation to their specialization in IT and Production Management, this demo-version of the software has been created as part of their final thesis at VIA University College in Horsens, Denmark. </string
